modName: NPCs And Horses_ more NPCs riding horses
summary: Adds differents NPC's to the game who ride horses across Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
After Update 1.2 there is now [color=GreenYellow]14 new NPC's with their horse[/color] in the world of Skyrim !

-3 Merchants
-5 Followers
-2 Vigilants of Stendarr
-2 Thalmor
-2 Travelers


[color=GreenYellow]____________________________________________________________________________________________[/color]
[color=GreenYellow]UPDATE 1.2: 
-Merchants and their horses are essentials, followers stay protected, others NPC's respawn.
-Adding 1 merchant (misc items) on horse travelling between Falkreath and Solitude.
-Adding 2 Vigilants of Stendarr on horse patrolling between Hall of the Vigilant and Riften.
-Adding 2 Thalmor on horse patrolling between Thalmor Ambassy and near Whiterun.
-Adding 2 Travelers.
-Fix Belethor shop name.
-Fix Ragru Sharbag itinerary, (now he move)
-Removing marriables followers for prevent a bug signaled during marriage. (a horse as witness ^_^ )
-Removing guard on horse around Whiterun.
-Mercenaries became followers.

-Cleaned with TES5EDIT.[/color]
[color=GreenYellow]____________________________________________________________________________________________[/color]

16/11: Ajout d'une version française.
11/11: Plugin added to BOSS recognized plugins list, download it safely :D .......... 

[color=GreenYellow]____________________________________________________________________________________________[/color]


NPCs And Horses now featured on [color=Yellow]ERSO[/color] (module 10.09) ! Thanks to Erkeil.

[url=http://erkeilmods.altervista.org/skyrim/][img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2013/43/1382434576-123.jpg[/img][/url]


[color=GreenYellow]____________________________________________________________________________________________[/color]


First i have to say that english isn't my native language so sorry for mistakes and others "bêtises".   :P


[size=25][color=red]WARNING[/color][/size]   This mod is work in PROGRESS and i'm quite beginner  (my first mod  indeed) but it never break your save, it's a LITTLE MOD without script or heavy content.


[size=10]Why this mod?[/size]

So i play Skyrim... and day after day i'm wondering: WHY THE HELL WE ARE IN A MEDIEVAL GAME AND WE HAVE JUST 2,3 LOST GUYS ON A HORSE IN AN ENTIRE REGION ? It breaking so much immersion for me that i wanted every time to find a mod which fix my disappointment, but i never found it. And i'm pretty sure you have the same thoughts in your mind if you like immersion like me !



[u][size=25]Description:[/size][/u]

This mod adds NPC's and  horses which are interconnected and never separate. They travel across Skyrim. The horse always follow his master even if he's not ride him.

-The NPC's are either protected (it mean that ONLY the player can kill them), either respawn, either essential (merchants)
-There is followers, merchants, travelers, Thalmor and Vigilants of Stendarr for the time being.
-All NPC's followers leveled up with the player up to the level 30.
-They have weapon, spells (racial abilities) and potions.


[color=GreenYellow]____________________________________________________________________________________________[/color]

The project is to add even more to create an immersive game combining existing mods as SkyTest or ImmersivePatrols.


I think 25 ou 30 NPC's (all with horses) in final version should be correct for maintain a balance with the vanilla game and other mods.


[color=GreenYellow]____________________________________________________________________________________________[/color]

[size=25]Installation:[/size]


-Just active it with Nexus Mod Manager or copy NPCsOnHorses.esp into the data folder of your skyrim installation.

-To update, first dismiss all followers you possibly take from the mod, then uninstall old version, install new with NMM or overwrite esp, no matter.


[size=25]Futur Plans:[/size]

-Adding different patrols with horses across Skyrim and more actions from NPC's.
-Adding couriers.
-Adding enemies.


[size=15][color=GreenYellow]Recommended with my mod:[/color][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950/?]Convenient Horses[/url] For horses management
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933/?]Extensible Follower Framework[/url] For NPC's management
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045/?]My Home Is Your Home[/url] To determine a home for your NPC's
